Text:
Thank you very much for this priceless treasure!

I am studying it and making a short score reduction from it

If you have the same for any others please share!

Downloaders - please note this follows the movie precisely. The soundtrack album is different though, and contains versions that splice together sections into combine pieces. See the "end credits for example", where the soundtrack starts with some measures from the finale and leads into a statement of the main theme to start.
